parameters.name: options.continuous
parameters.description: If true, the recognition continues even if the user pauses. Default: false.

parameters.name: options.interimResults
parameters.description: If true, partial results are returned while the user is still speaking. Default: false.

parameters.name: options.lang
parameters.description: The BCP 47 language tag for the recognition (e.g., 'en-US'). Default: 'en-US'.

returnValues.name: error
returnValues.description: Contains the error object if recognition fails.

returnValues.name: start
returnValues.description: Function to initialize and start the speech recognition session.

returnValues.name: transcript
returnValues.description: The accumulated text recognized from the speech input.
